name: Brownie on guard of cosiness
description:
You play as little brownie who wants to help his human master sleep. So do not let the fireplace go out, close the window when it blows, and turn off the annoying alarm clock.

Controls:

WASD - movement

E or Left Mouse Button - Action

Created for https://itch.io/jam/winter-melonjam-2022
